vulnerabilities.title: Dangerous Function Call: Command Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Use of os.system() can lead to security vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential command injection vulnerability

vulnerabilities.title: Dangerous Function Call: Command Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Use of subprocess.call() can lead to security vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential command injection vulnerability

vulnerabilities.title: Dangerous Function Call: Code Injection via eval()
vulnerabilities.description: Use of eval() can lead to security vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential code injection via eval() vulnerability

vulnerabilities.title: Dangerous Function Call: Code Injection via exec()
vulnerabilities.description: Use of exec() can lead to security vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential code injection via exec() vulnerability

vulnerabilities.title: Cryptographic Vulnerability: Weak Hash Algorithm (MD5)
vulnerabilities.description: Weak cryptographic practice detected: Weak Hash Algorithm (MD5)
vulnerabilities.impact: Data compromise, authentication bypass, man-in-the-middle attacks
mitigation: Use cryptographically secure random number generators

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Password
vulnerabilities.description: Hardcoded credential found in variable 'password'
vulnerabilities.impact: Credentials exposed in source code, version control
mitigation: Use configuration files outside version control

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Api Key
vulnerabilities.description: Hardcoded credential found in variable 'api_key'
vulnerabilities.impact: Credentials exposed in source code, version control
mitigation: Use configuration files outside version control

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Secret
vulnerabilities.description: Hardcoded credential found in variable 'api_key'
vulnerabilities.impact: Credentials exposed in source code, version control
mitigation: Use configuration files outside version control

vulnerabilities.title: Authentication Vulnerability: Hardcoded Username Check
vulnerabilities.description: Weak authentication pattern detected: Hardcoded Username Check
vulnerabilities.impact: Authentication bypass, unauthorized access

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Password
vulnerabilities.description: Pattern-based detection: Hardcoded Password
vulnerabilities.impact: Security vulnerability detected by pattern matching
mitigation: Review and remediate the identified code pattern

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Password
vulnerabilities.description: Pattern-based detection: Hardcoded Password
vulnerabilities.impact: Security vulnerability detected by pattern matching
mitigation: Review and remediate the identified code pattern

vulnerabilities.title: Dangerous Function Call: Deserialization Attack
vulnerabilities.description: Use of pickle.loads() can lead to security vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential deserialization attack vulnerability

vulnerabilities.title: Cryptographic Vulnerability: SSL Verification Disabled
vulnerabilities.description: Weak cryptographic practice detected: SSL Verification Disabled
vulnerabilities.impact: Data compromise, authentication bypass, man-in-the-middle attacks
mitigation: Use cryptographically secure random number generators

vulnerabilities.title: Cryptographic Vulnerability: Certificate Verification Disabled
vulnerabilities.description: Weak cryptographic practice detected: Certificate Verification Disabled
vulnerabilities.impact: Data compromise, authentication bypass, man-in-the-middle attacks
mitigation: Use cryptographically secure random number generators

vulnerabilities.title: Potentially Dangerous Import: Command Injection Risk
vulnerabilities.description: Import of subprocess module requires careful security review
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential security risk from subprocess usage
mitigation: Review all uses of subprocess module
Add security controls around dangerous functions

vulnerabilities.title: Potentially Dangerous Import: Unsafe Deserialization
vulnerabilities.description: Import of pickle module requires careful security review
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential security risk from pickle usage
mitigation: Review all uses of pickle module
Add security controls around dangerous functions

vulnerabilities.title: Potentially Dangerous Import: System Command Risk
vulnerabilities.description: Import of os module requires careful security review
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential security risk from os usage
mitigation: Review all uses of os module
Add security controls around dangerous functions

vulnerabilities.title: Potential SQL Injection via F-String
vulnerabilities.description: F-string with variable interpolation may be vulnerable to SQL injection
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential SQL injection vulnerability
mitigation: Avoid string concatenation for SQL queries

vulnerabilities.title: Potential SQL Injection via F-String
vulnerabilities.description: F-string with variable interpolation may be vulnerable to SQL injection
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential SQL injection vulnerability
mitigation: Avoid string concatenation for SQL queries

recommendations: High Priority: Remediate 11 high-severity vulnerabilities
Implement secure credential management system
Implement input validation and parameterized queries
Update cryptographic implementations to use strong algorithms
Integrate security scanning into CI/CD pipeline
Conduct regular security code reviews
Implement security training for development team
Establish security testing procedures

package.name: flask
package.description: A simple framework for building complex web applications.

vulnerabilities.title: Suspicious Package Characteristics
vulnerabilities.description: Package exhibits suspicious characteristics: Very new package (less than 30 days old), No maintainer information available
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential supply chain security risk

suspicious_indicators: Very new package (less than 30 days old)

         The NumPy repository and source distributions bundle several libraries that are

         Files: numpy/_core/src/multiarray/dragon4.c
         License: MIT
           For license text, see numpy/_core/src/multiarray/dragon4.c
         
         Name: libdivide
         Files: numpy/_core/include/numpy/libdivide/*
         License: Zlib
           For license text, see numpy/_core/include/numpy/libdivide/LICENSE.txt
         
         
         Note that the following files are vendored in the repository and sdist but not
         installed in built numpy packages:
         
         Name: Meson
         Files: vendored-meson/meson/*
         License: Apache 2.0
           For license text, see vendored-meson/meson/COPYING
         
         Name: spin
         Files: .spin/cmds.py
         License: BSD-3
           For license text, see .spin/LICENSE
         
         Name: tempita
         Files: numpy/_build_utils/tempita/*
         License: MIT
           For details, see numpy/_build_utils/tempita/LICENCE.txt
         
         ----

         format that is used as a compiler intermediate representation, or used
         for producing a compiler intermediate representation.
         
         The "Compilation Process" transforms code entirely represented in
         non-intermediate languages designed for human-written code, and/or in
         Java Virtual Machine byte code, into Target Code. Thus, for example,
         use of source code generators and preprocessors need not be considered
         part of the Compilation Process, since the Compilation Process can be
         understood as starting with the output of the generators or
         preprocessors.
         
         A Compilation Process is "Eligible" if it is done using GCC, alone or
         with other GPL-compatible software, or if it is done without using any
         work based on GCC. For example, using non-GPL-compatible Software to
         optimize any GCC intermediate representations would not qualify as an
         Eligible Compilation Process.

vulnerabilities.title: Suspicious Package Characteristics
vulnerabilities.description: Package exhibits suspicious characteristics: Very new package (less than 30 days old)
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential supply chain security risk

suspicious_indicators: Very new package (less than 30 days old)

vulnerabilities.title: Suspicious Package Characteristics
vulnerabilities.description: Package exhibits suspicious characteristics: No maintainer information available
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential supply chain security risk

package.name: django
package.description: A high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

vulnerabilities.title: Suspicious Package Characteristics
vulnerabilities.description: Package exhibits suspicious characteristics: Very new package (less than 30 days old), No maintainer information available
vulnerabilities.impact: Potential supply chain security risk

suspicious_indicators: Very new package (less than 30 days old)

package.name: pyyaml
package.description: YAML parser and emitter for Python

vulnerabilities.title: Outdated Package
vulnerabilities.description: Package has not been updated in 399 days
vulnerabilities.impact: May contain unpatched security vulnerabilities

recommendations: Review suspicious packages for supply chain security
Implement automated dependency scanning in CI/CD
Enable automated security updates where possible
Regular dependency audits and updates
Use dependency pinning and lock files
Monitor security advisories for used packages

vulnerabilities.title: Sensitive Path Mount: /var/run/docker.sock
vulnerabilities.description: Container has access to sensitive host path: /var/run/docker.sock
vulnerabilities.impact: Container can access sensitive host resources

vulnerabilities.title: Container Running as Root
vulnerabilities.description: Container explicitly configured to run as root user
vulnerabilities.impact: Privilege escalation risk if container is compromised
remediation: Use USER directive with non-root user

vulnerabilities.title: Sensitive Path Mount: /
vulnerabilities.description: Container has access to sensitive host path: /
vulnerabilities.impact: Container can access sensitive host resources

vulnerabilities.title: Sensitive Path Mount: /etc
vulnerabilities.description: Container has access to sensitive host path: /etc
vulnerabilities.impact: Container can access sensitive host resources

vulnerabilities.title: Sensitive Path Mount: /var
vulnerabilities.description: Container has access to sensitive host path: /var
vulnerabilities.impact: Container can access sensitive host resources

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Secret: Secret in Environment Variable
vulnerabilities.description: Potential hardcoded secret detected: Secret in Environment Variable
vulnerabilities.impact: Secrets exposed in container image

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Secret: OpenAI API Key
vulnerabilities.description: Potential hardcoded secret detected: OpenAI API Key
vulnerabilities.impact: Secrets exposed in container image

vulnerabilities.title: Hardcoded Secret: Secret in Environment Variable
vulnerabilities.description: Potential hardcoded secret detected: Secret in Environment Variable
vulnerabilities.impact: Secrets exposed in container image

vulnerabilities.title: Dangerous Port Exposed: SSH
vulnerabilities.description: Port 22 (SSH) is exposed
vulnerabilities.impact: Network exposure of SSH service
remediation: Review if port exposure is necessary
Use secure alternatives (HTTPS instead of HTTP)

vulnerabilities.title: Insecure Base Image Usage
vulnerabilities.description: Using 'latest' tag is not recommended
vulnerabilities.impact: Unpredictable and potentially vulnerable base image
remediation: Use specific version tags instead of 'latest'

vulnerabilities.title: Dangerous Port Exposed: MySQL
vulnerabilities.description: Port 3306 (MySQL) is exposed
vulnerabilities.impact: Network exposure of MySQL service
remediation: Review if port exposure is necessary
Use secure alternatives (HTTPS instead of HTTP)

vulnerabilities.title: Dangerous Port Exposed: HTTP (unencrypted)
vulnerabilities.description: Port 80 (HTTP (unencrypted)) is exposed
vulnerabilities.impact: Network exposure of HTTP (unencrypted) service
remediation: Review if port exposure is necessary
Use secure alternatives (HTTPS instead of HTTP)

vulnerabilities.title: No Resource Limits Configured
vulnerabilities.description: Container has no CPU or memory limits
vulnerabilities.impact: Container can consume unlimited host resources

recommendations: URGENT: Address critical infrastructure vulnerabilities immediately
High Priority: Fix 8 high-severity infrastructure issues
Review and implement principle of least privilege
Harden container configurations and remove unnecessary privileges
Review network security controls and restrict unnecessary access
Implement encryption and access controls for sensitive data
Implement infrastructure as code security scanning
Regular security audits of cloud configurations

vulnerabilities.title: Privileged Container
vulnerabilities.description: Container 'app-container' in pod 'vulnerable-pod' is privileged
vulnerabilities.impact: Container has full access to host system

vulnerabilities.title: Pod Running as Root
vulnerabilities.description: Pod 'vulnerable-pod' may be running as root user
vulnerabilities.impact: Container has unnecessary privileges

vulnerabilities.title: LoadBalancer Service Type
vulnerabilities.description: Service 'vulnerable-service' uses LoadBalancer type
vulnerabilities.impact: Service exposed to external traffic
remediation: Review if external access is necessary
Use ClusterIP or NodePort if appropriate
Use ingress controllers for HTTP traffic

recommendations: URGENT: Address critical infrastructure vulnerabilities immediately
High Priority: Fix 1 high-severity infrastructure issues
Review and implement principle of least privilege
Review network security controls and restrict unnecessary access
Implement infrastructure as code security scanning
Regular security audits of cloud configurations
Enable compliance monitoring and alerting
Implement security policy enforcement
